modShortDescription: We now have an ore ​​finder. This 7 Days to Die the ore sight mod allows you to see the ores while they are in the ground. Now ore mining will be easier.
modDescription:
We now have an ore ​​finder. This 7 Days to Die the ore sight mod allows you to see the ores while they are in the ground. Now ore [mining](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-mining/) will be easier.

To use this mod:

1. Go to the /configs/blocks.xml
2. Open it
3. Remove the xml comment tags ( <!– –> ) for the type of our your looking for.
4. Load the game and look for the specific ore.

**Note:** It is best to use only one ore type at time. At the moment There are not different colours for the different ores yet. Perhaps if there is enough support for this mod Adreden will use some time for makeing new shaders for the different ore types.

Gold and diamond ores need some love due to the way The Fun Pimps extends the blocks. Adreden will fix that.

[**Download**](https://gitlab.com/adredengaming/adreden_modlets/-/archive/master/adreden_modlets-master.zip?path=Adredens_Ore_Sight)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16328-adredens-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Adreden Gaming](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/adreden-gaming/)
